mapper.insert: insert into article( title , image , catalogid , istop , isflv , contents , addtime , hits ) values( #{title} , #{image} , #{catalogid} , #{istop} , #{isflv} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} )
mapper.update: update article set title=#{title} , image=#{image} , catalogid=#{catalogid} , istop=#{istop} , isflv=#{isflv} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} where articleid=#{articleid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.catalogname from article a , catalog b where a.catalogid = b.catalogid and isflv = '是' order by articleid desc limit 4
select a.* , b.catalogname from article a , catalog b where a.catalogid = b.catalogid and istop = '是' order by articleid desc limit 4
select a.* , b.catalogname from article a , catalog b where a.catalogid = b.catalogid order by hits desc limit 20
select a.* , b.catalogname from article a , catalog b where a.catalogid = b.catalogid and articleid=#{articleid} order by articleid desc
select a.* , b.catalogname from article a , catalog b where a.catalogid = b.catalogid and a.catalogid = #{catalogid} order by articleid desc limit 10

select a.* , b.catalogname from article a , catalog b where a.catalogid = b.catalogid
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and a.image like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{image}, '%'))
and a.catalogid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{catalogid}, '%'))
and a.istop like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{istop}, '%'))
and a.isflv like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{isflv}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
